name: Crab Nabbit!
description:
"A crab rigging my game? Nonsense! You're all just not as lucky as me!"

Nabbit must help the Gambler rig his game by making sure all dice rolls come out of the "magic" box with their blue-side facing up. Dice rolls don't really mean all that much when you're a crab. Personally, Nabbit cares more for the role they play in him getting extra Algae with his dinner!

Controls:

  • Use WASD or the Arrow keys to move
  • Use the Spacebar to flip nearby dice over!

TIPS:

  • Try to keep dice away from each other. Having too many dice next to each other can make it very difficult to move flip them all blue-side up!
  • Don't be afraid to push dice back to deal with later., because if just one gets through it's Game Over!
  • Nabbit can push two dice at once if you can line it up just right . A bug? No! Crabs have two claws after all don't they?
  • The panic button (top right) should only be used as a last resort!

Credits:

  • Jay Making hacked the planet
  • Tealova made it look good

This game was made in 48 hours as a part of the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.
